languages.text: "Я передам в вашу библиотеку пособие по дрессировке кибермастифов. При желании выдержки оттуда можно применять к людям". {n}Окинув взглядом притихших офицеров, проктор отдает честь и покидает мостик.{/n}

"I will send a compendium on cyber-mastiff training to your library. Some of the techniques described there also work on people if one were inclined to apply them." {n}Solomorne casts an eye at the unusually quiet bridge officers, then gives you a salute and leaves.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Я передам в вашу библиотеку пособие по дрессировке кибермастифов. При желании выдержки оттуда можно применять к людям". {n}Окинув взглядом притихших офицеров, проктор отдает честь и покидает мостик.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "I will send a compendium on cyber-mastiff training to your library. Some of the techniques described there also work on people if one were inclined to apply them." {n}Solomorne casts an eye at the unusually quiet bridge officers, then salutes to you and leaves.{/n}

"I will send a compendium on cyber-mastiff training to your library. Some of the techniques described there also work on people if one were inclined to apply them." {n}Solomorne casts an eye at the unusually quiet bridge officers, then salutes to you and leaves.{/n}

"I will send a compendium on cyber-mastiff training to your library. Some of the techniques described there also work on people if one were inclined to apply them." {n}Solomorne casts an eye at the unusually quiet bridge officers, then gives you a salute and leaves.{/n}

"I will send a compendium on cyber-mastiff training to your library. Some of the techniques described there also work on people if one were inclined to apply them." {n}Solomorne casts an eye at the unusually quiet bridge officers, then gives you a salute and leaves.{/n}

"I will send a compendium on cyber-mastiff training to your library. Some of the techniques described there also work on people if one were inclined to apply them." {n}Solomorne casts an eye at the unusually quiet bridge officers, then gives you a salute and leaves.{/n}

"I will send a compendium on cyber-mastiff training to your library. Some of the techniques described there also work on people if one were inclined to apply them." {n}Solomorne casts an eye at the unusually quiet bridge officers, then gives you a salute and leaves.{/n}

languages.text: «Enviaré un compendio sobre el entrenamiento de los cibermastines a su biblioteca. Algunas de las técnicas descritas en él también funcionan con personas, si quisiera probarlas». {n}Solomorne lanza una mirada a los oficiales del puente, que por una vez han permanecido en silencio, antes de dedicarte un saludo militar y marcharse.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I will send a compendium on cyber-mastiff training to your library. Some of the techniques described there also work on people if one were inclined to apply them." {n}Solomorne casts an eye at the unusually quiet bridge officers, then gives you a salute and leaves.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Enviaré un compendio sobre el entrenamiento de los cibermastines a su biblioteca. Algunas de las técnicas descritas en él también funcionan con personas, si quisiera probarlas». {n}Solomorne lanza una mirada a los oficiales del puente, que por una vez han permanecido en silencio, antes de dedicarte un saludo militar y marcharse.{/n}

languages.text: “我会把生化獒犬训练技术的相关资料送到你的图书馆。书中描述的部分技巧也同样适用于人类，假设某些人真的打算这么做的话。”{n}索罗蒙扫了一眼周围，看了看舰桥上噤若寒蝉的军官，随后向你敬了个礼，离开了。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I will send a compendium on cyber-mastiff training to your library. Some of the techniques described there also work on people if one were inclined to apply them." {n}Solomorne casts an eye at the unusually quiet bridge officers, then gives you a salute and leaves.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “我会把生化獒犬训练技术的相关资料送到你的图书馆。书中描述的部分技巧也同样适用于人类，假设某些人真的打算这么做的话。”{n}索罗蒙扫了一眼周围，看了看舰桥上噤若寒蝉的军官，随后向你敬了个礼，离开了。{/n}

languages.text: « Je ferai parvenir un manuel de dressage des cyber-mastiffs à votre bibliothèque. À toutes fins utiles, sachez que certaines des techniques qui y sont décrites fonctionnent également sur les humains. » {n}Solomorne jette un regard en direction des officiers de la passerelle qui se tiennent étrangement cois, puis il vous salue avant de prendre congé.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I will send a compendium on cyber-mastiff training to your library. Some of the techniques described there also work on people if one were inclined to apply them." {n}Solomorne casts an eye at the unusually quiet bridge officers, then gives you a salute and leaves.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Je ferai parvenir un manuel de dressage des cyber-mastiffs à votre bibliothèque. À toutes fins utiles, sachez que certaines des techniques qui y sont décrites fonctionnent également sur les humains. » {n}Solomorne jette un regard en direction des officiers de la passerelle qui se tiennent étrangement cois, puis il vous salue avant de prendre congé.{/n}

languages.text: 「サイバーマスチフの訓練に関する概要をあなたのライブラリに送っておきます。そこに書かれているいくつかのテクニックは、それらを適用したいと思う方にも役立つはずです」{n}ソロモーンは、非常に静かなブリッジの士官に目を向けてから、あなたに敬礼し去る。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I will send a compendium on cyber-mastiff training to your library. Some of the techniques described there also work on people if one were inclined to apply them." {n}Solomorne casts an eye at the unusually quiet bridge officers, then gives you a salute and leaves.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「サイバーマスチフの訓練に関する概要をあなたのライブラリに送っておきます。そこに書かれているいくつかのテクニックは、それらを適用したいと思う方にも役立つはずです」{n}ソロモーンは、非常に静かなブリッジの士官に目を向けてから、あなたに敬礼し去る。{/n}

languages.text: "Kütüphanenize siber mastif eğitimi üzerine bir derleme göndereceğim. Orada anlatılan tekniklerin kimisi, kişinin bunları uygulamaya meyilli olması durumunda insanlar üzerinde de işe yarar." {n}Solomorne, alışılmadık derecede sessiz olan köprü subaylarına baktıktan sonra sana selam verip ortamdan ayrılıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I will send a compendium on cyber-mastiff training to your library. Some of the techniques described there also work on people if one were inclined to apply them." {n}Solomorne casts an eye at the unusually quiet bridge officers, then gives you a salute and leaves.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Kütüphanenize siber mastif eğitimi üzerine bir derleme göndereceğim. Orada anlatılan tekniklerin kimisi, kişinin bunları uygulamaya meyilli olması durumunda insanlar üzerinde de işe yarar." {n}Solomorne, alışılmadık derecede sessiz olan köprü subaylarına baktıktan sonra sana selam verip ortamdan ayrılıyor.{/n}

languages.text: "Ich lasse ein Kompendium über die Abrichtung von Cyber-Mastiffs in Eure Bibliothek bringen. Einige der darin beschriebenen Techniken funktionieren auch bei Personen, wenn man sie auf sie anwendet." {n}Solomorne wirft einen Blick auf die ungewöhnlich schweigsamen Brückenoffiziere, ehe er vor dir salutiert und geht.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I will send a compendium on cyber-mastiff training to your library. Some of the techniques described there also work on people if one were inclined to apply them." {n}Solomorne casts an eye at the unusually quiet bridge officers, then gives you a salute and leaves.{/n}
